user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an email introducing himself to me (sarah@zenithinnovations.com). Tell him to check out his Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick Introduction & Project Resources

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well! Could you please send a brief introductory email to Sarah (sarah@zenithinnovations.com) at your earliest convenience so the two of you can get acquainted before the project kicks off?

Also, when you have a moment, please check your Notion workspace for the latest project information and resources.

Thank you, and looking forward to working with you both!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Subject: Quick Introduction & Project Resources

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well! Could you please send a brief introductory email to Sarah (sarah@zenithinnovations.com) at your earliest convenience so the two of you can get acquainted before the project kicks off?

Also, when you have a moment, please check your Notion workspace for the latest project information and resources.

Thank you, and looking forward to working with you both!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
